front.title: Deriving Fast Handover Key from MSK to secure the FMIPv6 signaling

abstract.t: This specification introduces an alternate, low-consumption mechanism for protecting signaling messages between the Mobile Node and previous Access Router for Fast Mobile IPv6. The alternate method defined here utilizes the Master Session Key(MSK) generated from EAP authentication to derive a fast handover key between the Mobile Node and the Access Router in order to avoid certain attacks. This mechanism also adds the Mobile Node Identifier option and the mobility message authentication option to the FMIPv6 signaling messages
